cards.rules_text:
Trample
[i]Black Flash — [/i]Whenever Yuji Itadori deals combat damage to a player, target instant or sorcery card in your graveyard gains flashback until end of turn. The flashback cost is equal to its mana cost. [i](You may cast that card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
[i]Solo Forbidden Area — [/i]If a triggered ability of another legendary creature you control triggers, that ability triggers an additional time.

{1}{B}, Sacrifice X nonland permanents: Target player loses X life and you get {X} incarnate counters.
When you have twenty incarnate counters, transform this enchantment.
The King of All Curses can be your commander.

Haste, trample
Whenever Ryomen Sukuna attacks, each player loses half their life, rounded up.

[i]That's How Losers Think! — [/i]Kashimo attacks each combat if able.
You may have Yuta enter as a copy of a creature card in a graveyard, except he has “This creature has all activated abilities of creatures you control that don't have the same name as this creature.”
cards.flavor_text: [i]“We've always pushed the burden of being a monster onto him alone! If no one else will, I will become one!”[/i]

cards.rules_text:
{1}{U}, {T}: Choose one —
• [i]Don't Move — [/i]Creatures lose and can't gain ward and hexproof until end of turn.
• [i]Run Away — [/i]Target creature can't be blocked until end of turn.
• [i]Sleep — [/i]Tap and put a stun counter on target creature.

During your turn, noncreature artifacts you control are 2/2 Construct creatures in addition to their other types.
[i]Charge — [/i]{WU}, Pay 2 life: Target artifact creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn. Activate only as a sorcery.
cards.flavor_text: [i]“Take a chance with me, will you?”[/i]

As long as Mechamaru: Absolute Model is a creature, its power is equal to the difference between your life total and starting life total.

Whenever you cast a spell from your hand, if mana from a Treasure was spent to cast, exile that spell and copy it. You may play the exiled card on a later turn without paying its mana cost.

cards.rules_text:
Whenever an opponent commits a crime, that opponent loses 1 life and you investigate. This ability triggers only once each turn. [i](Targeting opponents, anything they control, and/or cards in their graveyards is a crime.)[/i]

cards.rules_text2:
[i]Prepare Evidence — [/i]Whenever a player casts a spell, that player exiles any number of cards from their graveyard. If the total mana value of the cards exiled this way is less than the mana value of the spell, they lose life equal to the difference.
{T}: Add {W} or {B}. You may transform Deadly Sentencing.

cards.rules_text:
Each Human creature you control enters with an additional +1/+1 counter on it.
If a Human you control would die, if it has one or more +1/+1 counters on it, you may remove all +1/+1 counters from it and regenerate it instead. [i](The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it.)[/i]

cards.flavor_text: [i]Timeless techniques are called such for a reason.[/i]

cards.rules_text:
Whenever you draw your second card each turn, create a 2/2 black Human Sorcerer creature token.
Whenever an opponent mills one or more cards for the first time each turn, amass Spirits 2. [i](Put two +1/+1 counters on an Army you control. It's also a Spirit. If you don't control an Army, create a 0/0 black Spirit Army creature token first.)[/i]
